page.title: 16 Shopping
page.content: {2 use Wansford garages, { 1 uses an Uppingham garage. {SHOPS:As there are no shops at all in {either Upton or Southorpe people tend {to do as much shopping as possible at {regular times:2-3 times/week,once/week {or even only once /month,for their {main supplies { 7 go to Bretton, { 5 go to Peterborough, { 4 go to Stamford, { 1 goes to Cambridge, { 1 goes to Oundle, { 1 goes to Castor. {Bringing supplies of milk a float {comes once every two days. { The post is collected and {delivered once every day. { In Upton there is no bus service {except for a school bus from Glinton. {However there is a regular bus service {in Southorpe.
